section.title: Overview
section.p: Sessions in NCC application are either terminated with a CCR-T request or cleaned by a session audit logic, if the session is found as stale one.

A CCR-T is processed whether a wrong MSCC or no MSCC value is received. However, if MSCC has an entry in the Diameter Gy session but the MSCC value is not received for a CCR-T, then an alarm is raised.
section.note: The RSU AVP value is ignored in a CCR-T request.
